verses.verse: ( Jesus Teaches at the Feast) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - μετὰ <WG3326> meta After ταῦτα <WG3778> tauta this , περιεπάτει <WG4043> periepatei traveled ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus ἐν <WG1722> en throughout τῇ <WG3588> tē - Γαλιλαίᾳ <WG1056> Galilaia Galilee . οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv γὰρ <WG1063> gar - ἤθελεν <WG2309> ēthelen He did not want ἐν <WG1722> en in τῇ <WG3588> tē - Ἰουδαίᾳ <WG2449> Ioudaia Judea , περιπατεῖν <WG4043> peripatein to travel ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because ἐζήτουν <WG2212> ezētoun were trying αὐτὸν <WG846> auton Him . οἱ <WG3588> hoi the Ἰουδαῖοι <WG2453> Ioudaioi Jews [there] ἀποκτεῖναι <WG615> apokteinai to kill
